Recommendations: The administration might want to own a community radio station that will be managed by the DevCom Department.
Additional instructional facilities and equipment may be purchased for students' use,
A comprehensive Supervisory Program may be done to include the four fold functions of the academe viz: instruction, research, extension and production.
A tracer study of the graduates may be done annually to determine the employability of the graduates.
A participative and collaborative activity in generating resources and income may be done among administration, faculty, staff and students.
